segments.text: How do you do , Mr.Smith ? This is Lili . I'm calling to thank you for the wonderful dinner we had yesterday . I enjoyed it very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome . I'd like you to join us for dinner again sometime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Mr.Smith . I'm returning to China today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I appreciate all help and in particular , all the time that you've spent on my account during my stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it . I am pleased to help you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If there's anything that I can help you in the future , please let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll do that.Thank you.Have a safe trip home .
segments.speaker: S2
